archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Analyze new service directions/enhance existing service
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Analyze to identify new service directions, potential enhancements to existing services Extended Description Analyze new service directions/enhance existing service processes focus on research and analyze customer, technology, competitor and marketing information identify new service directions and industry best practice, and potential enhancements to existing services Explanatory Reserved for future use.
